## OtherPersonFactory interface

Factory class for [OtherPerson](./verse-core.otherperson.md)<!-- -->. It must be created by the user of [Verse](./verse-core.verse.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface OtherPersonFactory 
```

## Remarks

`create` is called each time a connection is made with another player to be displayed.

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
